product_overview: The FC Onboarding App Guided Tour is a React Native mobile application feature designed to provide new users a seamless onboarding experience through an interactive guided tour utilizing coachmark overlays, tooltips, and progress indications.
core_goals: Provide first-time users with a clear, step-by-step onboarding tour in Korean to enhance app familiarity.
Ensure the tour automatically starts after app hydration and enable manual restart via a coach button.
Highlight key UI components, such as progress cards and step indicators, to visually guide users through onboarding milestones.
Maintain performance and visual consistency with custom styling aligned to brand palette and accessibility considerations.
key_features: Custom coachmark tooltip component with Korean labels and CTA icons.
TourGuideProvider wrapping home screen to manage tour state and overlay positioning with configurable vertical offset.
Auto-start of onboarding tour once after hydration with manual restart capability via a styled coach button.
Highlighting progress card header and status with TourGuideZone using rectangular overlays.
Progress bar component showing active and completed steps for onboarding progress visualization.
Styled coach button adhering to Hanwha brand colors to invoke the guided tour.
Overlay tooltips styled with shadows and spacing to ensure readability and engagement.
Integration with rn-tourguide and react-native-svg to render high-quality overlays reliably.
user_flow_summary: User launches app and after initial hydration, the onboarding tour automatically starts guided by canStart guard and timeout logic.
User is visually guided through key UI areas including progress card headers and step indicators via coachmark tooltips.
User can manually restart the tour at any time by tapping the coach button styled in brand colors.
Tour overlays and tooltips display Korean labels and clear CTA icons to assist user understanding.
Upon completing the tour, user can continue using the app with enhanced familiarity of onboarding progress UI components.
validation_criteria: Onboarding tour starts automatically once after app hydration and does not restart unexpectedly.
Coach button correctly triggers manual restart of the tour and is styled consistently with brand guidelines.
Tooltips display Korean text accurately and include CTA icons as specified.
TourGuideZone highlights the correct UI components with rectangular overlays as per design.
Progress bar component accurately reflects active and completed steps.
Overlays and tooltips render correctly across supported devices with no layout or styling issues.
Dependencies such as rn-tourguide and react-native-svg are correctly integrated and do not cause performance regressions.
